page.title: 02Indoor Recreation in Alton
page.content: The Community Centre is a large building near the middle of Alton.In it there is a bar for members and a large hall where discos, markets and jumble sales are held. There is a room upstairs where the old people go for some peace and quiet.There are competitions in the bar such as darts and the person who makes us laugh the most. I go to the Sports Centre on the edge of town on Thursday,Saturday and Sunday.It has activities which appeal to a wide age range.I play tennis at the Centre.You can also try badminton, squash,table tennis,trampolining, swimming,roller skating,weight training, judo, archery, pistol shooting and keep fit.You can go on the B.M.X. bicycle ramp outside, or in the sauna or jacuzi. There is a cafe where you can get refreshments.
